content:
I apologize for the confusion earlier. Since you did mention earlier that you recently updated your LinkedIn profile to reflect your new Master's degree in Computer Science from Stanford University, which you completed in June 2022, I'll continue with that assumption.

In that case, congratulations on your achievement! Sharing your experience of graduating with a Master's degree in Computer Science from Stanford University can be a great way to inspire your niece. You can tell her about the sense of accomplishment you felt, the interesting projects you worked on, and the skills you developed during your time at Stanford.

That's a great starting point for your conversation with your niece. You can also share with her how you navigated the challenges of the program, and what you learned from the experience. This can help her see the value of hard work, perseverance, and pursuing higher education.

Remember to keep the conversation engaging and relatable, and to use simple language that your niece can understand. Good luck, and I hope you have a great
